      • getRecall

        public double getRecall(T clazz)
        Return the recall for the specified class. It corresponds to the probability that a (randomly selected) actual instance of the specified class is classified as such.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the recall for the specified class.

      • getPrecision

        public double getPrecision(T clazz)
        Return the precision for the specified class. It corresponds to the probability that a (randomly selected) instance classified as the specified class is actually of this class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the recall for the specified class.

      • getTrueNegativeRate

        public double getTrueNegativeRate(T clazz)
        Return the precision for the specified class. It corresponds to the probability that a (randomly selected) instance that is not of the specified class is classified as a different class than the specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the recall for the specified class.

      • getAccuracy

        public double getAccuracy(T clazz)
        Returns the accuracy for the specified class. It corresponds to the probability that a randomly selected instance will be correctly classified (true positive or true negative).
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the accuracy for the specified class.

      • getFMeasure

        public double getFMeasure(T clazz)
        Returns the F-Measure for the specified class, with equal importance given to recall and precision.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the F-Measure for the specified class.
        See Also:
        getFMeasure(Object, double)

      • getFMeasure

        public double getFMeasure(T clazz,
                 double beta)
        Returns the F-Measure for the specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        beta - How much importance is given to recall compared to precision.
        Returns:
        the F-Measure for the specified class.

      • getTruePositives

        public int getTruePositives(T clazz)
        Returns the number of instances correctly classified as the specified class. They are actually of this class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the number of instances correctly classified as the specified class.

      • getFalsePositives

        public int getFalsePositives(T clazz)
        Returns the number of instances incorrectly classified as the specified class. They are actually not of this class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        the number of instances incorrectly classified as the specified class.

      • getTrueNegatives

        public int getTrueNegatives(T clazz)

        clazz - The considered class.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of instances that are not classified as the specified class, and are not of this class in reality.
